document_data.name: Keevosen Nihili
document_data.mainbody: '''Keevosen Nihili''' was a [[shadovar]] spy in restored [[Myth Drannor]] in [[1375 DR]].
document_data.History:
Keevosen established herself near the restored Myth Drannor in the old house of the [[Blackthorn]] family with a group of [[People of the Black Blood]] [[werewolf|werewolves]] at her service. On the surface, she was friendly with the [[elves]], helping to slay the remaining monsters and occasional invaders, but in truth she spied for her shadovar masters.

In [[1375 DR]], after the [[second battle of Shadowdale]], she set an ambush for a group of adventurers who, with the help of [[Darcassan]], were investigating the theft of the ''[[Nether Scrolls]]'' from [[Windsong Tower]]. However the adventurers defeated Keevosen and her werewolf minions.
document_data.Relationship: She had as a [[familiar]] a [[crow]] called [[Medar]].
